info.author: Patrick Miller
info.description:
Distributed Parallel Programming for Python! This package builds on 
traditional Python by enabling users to write distributed, parallel programs 
based on MPI message passing primitives. General python objects can be 
messaged between processors.  Many MPI version 1.1 functions (e.g. send, recv, 
isend, bcast, barrier, comm_dup, etc...) available to Python for arbitrary, 
picklable types.
info.license: Open Source -- see LICENSE.txt for details
info.name: pyMPI
info.summary: MPI bindings for Python!  Brings distributed parallel programming to Python from small SMP to huge clusters.
info.html_description: Distributed Parallel Programming for Python! This package builds on traditional Python by enabling users to write distributed, parallel programs based on MPI message passing primitives. General python objects can be messaged between processors. Many MPI version 1.1 functions (e.g. send, recv, isend, bcast, barrier, comm_dup, etc…) available to Python for arbitrary, picklable types.
